Instructions.Value: Unlike most Clan combat vehicles, the Epona Pursuit Tank is only produced by Clan Hell's Horses, where it is considered a front-line unit and sees service in the most prestigious Galaxies. The Epona is a fast vehicle that can chase down opponents and serve as a scout. In order to increase its survivability, the Epona is built on the largest hovercraft frame possible. It is still speedy, but this comes at the price of armor. Hover: Fast on open ground and water, slow in rough terrain, not very agile, cannot move through woods. Movement: 9/14 Hex: 270/420 Meters.
